angry: Paathu deep breath edunga, konjam calm aagura madhiri try pannunga. Ippo situation la react panna badhila, konjam time kuduthu yosichu pesunga.
Ipdi kovam vandha music kekka try pannunga, adhu unga mind relax aagura madhiri irukkum.
Kovathula pesuna neraya thappu aagidum. Athanaala konjam calm aagitu pesuna better.
Situation la irundhu konjam veliya poyittu walk pannunga, fresh air ungala relax panna help pannum.
Close friend or family member kitta pesunga, avanga unga kovathai understand pannitu support kuduppanga.
fear: Bayam varuthu nu nenaika vendam, ellarukum bayam varum. Konjam deep breath eduthutu yosikunga, indha bayam temporary thaan.
Grounding technique try pannunga, unga breathing mela focus pannunga.
Past la neenga overcome pannina situations nenachunga, adhu unga mind ku confidence kudukkum.
Supportive friend kitta pesunga, avanga unga mind calm panna help pannuvanga.
Safe place imagine pannunga, unga mind la oru calm situation create pannunga.
happy: Super ah iruku! Indha happy moment enjoy pannunga, unga smile mattumumumum positive vibes kudukkum.
Unga happiness ah unga close ah irukra friend kitta share pannunga, avangalum happy aaguvanga.
Innaiku enna nala nadandhuchu nu note pannunga, indha memory future ku motivation aagum.
Unga small success ah kuda celebrate pannunga, athu unga confidence ah boost pannum.
Ippadi positive energy ah mattumum maintain pannunga, ungala pakra ellarum inspire aaguvanga.
neutral: Neenga ippadi calm ah irukkum bodhu, idhu oru nalla chance unga goals ah plan panna.
Mind la neraya clarity irukkum bodhu, creative ah oru pudhu thing try pannunga.
Unga surroundings observe pannunga, konjam mindfulness practice pannunga.
Neenga balanced ah irukkum bodhu, pudhu ideas develop panna try pannunga.
Plan ahead panna ippo romba nalla neram. Ungaluku clarity la decisions edutha easy ah irukkum.
sad: Sad feel pannathu normal da, adha suppress panna vendam. Allow pannunga unga feelings ah, konjam konjam light aagidum.
Music kekka try pannunga, adhu unga mind ku romba relief kudukkum.
Trust panna person kitta pesunga, avanga unga pain ah share pannina konjam light aagidum.
Journaling try pannunga, unga emotions paper la ezhuduna unga heart la irundhu konjam weight kammi aagidum.
Short walk ponga, outside air and small changes unga mood ah improve panna help pannum.
